description.value: Minion Attaches itself to a host and influences its behaviour, be it a Xenos, Warp Parasite, Strange Machine, etc. It must be Size(2) or Smaller. Theoretically even if its host dies, it can be implanted into a new host. It must come into Physical Contact with its would be host, infecting it after 1d5 Rounds, +1 Round per AP on the location the Parasite is entering through, successful attacks against it cause only half damage. A Successful Opposed Strength Test pulls it out before it has finished infection, causing 1d5 Damage ignoring Toughness. If the Parasite finishes entering its host, the host makes a -20 Toughness Test or succumbs to the Parasite's influence permenantly unless it is medically removed or the host dies.
